sense.gloss: driving opponent out of the ring while gripping his belt

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑３８↑↓さんじゅうはっ↓↑歳↑↓さい↓なのに↑両親↑↓りょうしん↓に↑頼↑↓た|よ↓りきり|です。
sdata.e: Though 38, he is still dependent on his parents.
